reference.title: SQL syntax
reference.shortdesc: SQL syntax is presented in modified BNF notation.

table.title: BNF meta-symbols

section.p: The following example shows how SQL syntax is presented: CREATE [ UNIQUE ] INDEX IndexName ON TableName ( SimpleColumnName [ , SimpleColumnName ] * )
